channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jamie Dimon tells Davos: ‘You didn’t do a particularly good job making the world a better place’
item.description: "What the hell else do you want me to say?"

item.title: Slipping on ICE: innocent retailers are the latest collateral damage from Trump’s perpetual noise machine
item.description: ICE is slipping on a puddle of its own making. Let's not put the rest of our crucial nationwide retailers on shaky footing.

item.title: The First Decisions of the Year Matter More Than You Think
item.description: The mindset leaders bring into January and their early choices shape execution, clarity, and results.

item.title: Nearly 400 millionaires and billionaires across 24 countries are demanding Davos leaders to tax them more: ‘Tax us. Tax the super rich.’

item.title: Trump’s arrival in Davos off to a bumpy start, as his quest for Greenland could take center stage

item.title: These Are the Jobs AI Can Do Best, Microsoft Researchers Say
item.description: A recent report ranks the 40 roles that most closely align with generative AI skills.

item.title: Jensen Huang says AI bubble fears are dwarfed by ‘the largest infrastructure buildout in human history’

item.title: Warren Buffett’s successor could be selling off millions of Berkshire Hathaway’s Kraft Heinz shares
item.description: Warren Buffett’s successor appears to be considering his first significant move after taking over as CEO this month. Kraft Heinz warned investors Tues...

item.title: Can AI Find Hidden Energy Sources? This Company Raised $115 Million to Do Just That
item.description: Zanskar leverages AI to help identify geothermal resources, then uses conventional technologies to extract it.

item.title: Connected data will rescue healthcare

item.title: How Tom Holland’s NA Beer Brand Bero Turned This Overlooked Retail Channel Into a Sales Driver
item.description: A handful of locations still can fuel an outsize impact.

item.title: This New Tech Feature Could Change How People Use Netflix
item.description: The function made its global debut January 20.

item.title: Trump’s AI deal for Silicon Valley: Build your own nuclear, skip years of regulation

item.title: 4 strategies for building a ‘good enough’ financial plan and portfolio
